name: Agent Klutz (itch)
description:
Sync your footsteps with the music as you sneak your way through this experimental, hand-drawn / pixel art hybrid action-rhythm game.

Be a blundering, murderous coward!

Shoot everyone on sight, ask questions later.

Be a graceless kleptomaniac!

Steal as much as possible wherever you go.

Be the most clumsy, airheaded, incompetent spy of all time!

Trip over your own feet and fall on your face.
